Reviews.Title: very excelent quality
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: excelent quality and the price was reasonable. thought it was a bit smaller but i made it fit where i was going to install it inside a a/c duct in the ceiling

Reviews.Title: Great little cameras
Reviews.Author: Chris from Norman, OK "Chris"
Reviews.Content: We tried both these and the dome cameras and decided to send back the dome cameras and buy more of these.  I would consider this a premium camera for the Revo System or other compatable system.Pros : Small, will rotate up to 90 degrees so it when on a ceiling you can have it run parallel to the ceiling and not pointing down at a 45 degree angle, Wide Angle, Great Night Vision!Cons: No protective case, won't work outside

Reviews.Title: Not so bad according to price
Reviews.Author: Hnin S. Khin
Reviews.Content: The output picture is not very good but it can accept with their price range. They do not have electronic light compensation (ELC) so little flickering effect with lighting,

Reviews.Title: Big Improvement
Reviews.Author: Elvin Nelson
Reviews.Content: The picture is much sharper than our other cameras.  We plan to purchase more of these cameras and replace some of our older cameras

Reviews.Title: Need clear image on a person
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: They still don't show images of a person clear had to put two in one room in order to get blind spots in the classroom.

Reviews.Title: Revo Rcts30-3 700 TVL Camera.
Reviews.Author: Foxwood
Reviews.Content: Picture not as sharp as expected. It was easy to connect to system as it was a replacement for an existing camera. Price was the motivation for purchase'

Reviews.Title: Nice small camera with limited zoom capability
Reviews.Author: xxx
Reviews.Content: Very good camera.  Good low light operation, adjustable focus and zoom good, although a little touchy.  Size is great for mounting in constricted area.

Reviews.Title: Maybe refurbished
Reviews.Author: FRANK THE TANK
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 sets of these and one set was defective. Why if these are new? And why both cameras from the same box?

Reviews.Title: Great design
Reviews.Author: ryan farris
Reviews.Content: I like the slim design compared to the older turret models that I currently have. It looks sleeker for my nice new house
